recipe.title: Pineapple, Honeydew, and Mango with Ginger and Fresh Herbs
ingredients: 1 cup diced seeded peeled honeydew melon
1 tablespoon thinly sliced fresh cilantro or mint
instructions: Mix all ingredients except sesame seeds in large bowl. Let stand 10 minutes for flavors to blend. Divide fruit mixture among wineglasses and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
